bibl.title: The Development of Cities in Cyprus from the Archaic to the Roman Period.
bibl.note: Diss. Columbia Univ. Summary in DA 50 (1989-1990) p. 521-A. - Part Two concerns the establishment, under the Ptolemies, of normal Greek political forms in teh Cypriot cities. Discussion of two inscriptions which illuminate Cyprus' political geography in the Hellenistic period.
Watkin Henry Jay, The Development of Cities in Cyprus from the Archaic to the Roman Period.
